SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwTRSothaMachine01Script


;controls act_sotha_monster1
;this is the main script for the fabricant machine
;it decides if fabricants are made and plays the anims for everything, opens the doors, etc

;sotha_machine2 script controls the second lever and the second door only

short state		;the state of the lever, 0 down, 1 up
short move		;tells the lever and door to move
float timer		;for timing the creature making and such
short make		;true when making creature and controlling door #1
float timer2		;for timing player getting stuck in machine
short inside		;for making sure player isn't inside
short Fabstate      ;which Fabricant is enabled already

;******************************************
;  turn lever and open the door
;
;******************************************

begin  OnActivate

;can only move this lever if the second other door is shut and no creature is being made
;otherwise, play sound

	if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor2State == 0 )
		if ( make == 0 )
			set move to 1
		endif
	else
		PlaySound 0LockedDoor
	endif

end

begin gamemode

	if  ( move == 1 )

;animate the lever
		if ( state == 0 )
			PlayGroup forward 1
			set state to 1
		else
			PlayGroup backward 1
			set state to 0
		endif

;animate the door
		if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State == 0 )

;push anims on to open
			fbmwactUsothaUmachUdoor1.PlayGroup forward 1
			set  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State to 1

		else	
;push anims on to close
			fbmwactUsothaUmachUdoor1.PlayGroup backward 1
			set  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State to 0

		endif

		set move to 0

	endif


;******************************************
;  make creatures, open door, etc
;
;******************************************

;check status of doors and the state of making fabs

	if ( make == 0 )
		if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State == 0 )
			if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor2State == 0 )	
				if ( timer > 15 )		;only makes them every 10 seconds
					set make to 10	
					set timer to 0	
				else
					set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( make >= 10 )

;play the anim and sound
		if ( make == 10 )
			PlaySound 0SothaFabMachine
			fbmwTRSothaPowertubesREF.LoopGroup Idle, 6 ,1
			set make to 20
		endif

;open door for creature after 5 secs
		if ( make == 20 )
			if ( timer > 3 )		;door opens in 3 seconds and creature is made, it is in these 3 seconds you can open other door

;PlaceItemCell, "fabricant_machine_1", "Sotha Sil, Dome of Serlyn" 4364, 5091, 12541, 190 <- This would bloat the savegame.

				if Fabstate == 0 || Fabstate == 10
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF1.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF1.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF1.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF1.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 1
				elseif Fabstate == 1
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF2.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF2.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF2.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF2.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 2
				elseif Fabstate == 2
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF3.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF3.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF3.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF3.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 3
				elseif Fabstate == 3
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF4.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF4.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF4.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF4.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 4
				elseif Fabstate == 4
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF5.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF5.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF5.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF5.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 5
				elseif Fabstate == 5
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF6.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF6.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF6.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF6.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 6
				elseif Fabstate == 6
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF7.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF7.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF7.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF7.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 7
				elseif Fabstate == 7
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF8.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF8.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF8.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF8.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 8
				elseif Fabstate == 8
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF9.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF9.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF9.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF9.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 9
				elseif Fabstate == 9
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF10.resurrect
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF10.moveto fbmwTRsothaFabMachineMarker
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF10.Enable
					fbmwFabricantMachineREF10.StartCombat Player
					set Fabstate to 10
				endif



				fbmwactUsothaUmachUdoor1.PlayGroup forward 1
				set  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State to 1
				fbmwTRSothaPowertubesREF.PlayGroup Idle 1
				set make to 30	
				set timer to 0	

			else
				set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
			endif

		endif

;close the door behind the creature and reset
		if ( make == 30 )
			if ( timer > 7 )		;door closes in 7 seconds

;push anims on to close
				if ( fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachInside == 1 )
					set timer2 to 0
					set inside to 1
					return
				else
					set timer2 to ( timer2 + GetSecondsPassed )
					if ( timer2 < 5 )
						return
					endif
					set inside to 0
					if ( inside == 0 )
						fbmwactUsothaUmachUdoor1.PlayGroup backward 1
						set  fbmwTRSothaSil.ActSothaMachDoor1State to 0
						set make to 0		;can now make again
						set timer to 0	
					endif
				endif
			else
				set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
			endif

		endif

	endif

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
